symbol.description: Symbol used to denote that a number is a monetary value.

value.description: Amount represented as a combination of the major and minor currency unit (uses a decimal separator).

symbol.description: Symbol used to denote that a number is a monetary value.

value.description: Amount represented as a combination of the major and minor currency unit (uses a decimal separator).

amountTitle.description: The label for the 'Amount' (= unit x price) column in the listing of line items on the invoice.

id.description: The unique identifier for the business.

disableBankPayments.description: Within a business that is enabled to accept bank payments, indicates if this individual invoice has been marked to not be payable by bank payment.

disableCreditCardPayments.description: Within a business that is enabled to accept credit card payments, indicates if this individual invoice has been marked to not be payable by card.

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate to business's currency from the invoice's currency. Used to value the invoice income within Wave's accounting transactions.

hideAmount.description: Indicates whether item's amount is hidden in the line items listing.

hideDescription.description: Indicates whether item's description in item column is hidden in the line items listing.

hideName.description: Indicates whether item's product name in item column is hidden in the line items listing.

hidePrice.description: Indicates whether item's price is hidden in the line items listing.

hideUnit.description: Indicates whether item's unit is hidden in the line items listing.

invoiceNumber.description: Unique number assigned to the invoice.

itemTitle.description: The label for the 'Item' column in the line items listing.

symbol.description: Symbol used to denote that a number is a monetary value.

value.description: Amount represented as a combination of the major and minor currency unit (uses a decimal separator).
Amount represented as a combination of the major and minor currency unit (uses a decimal separator).

id.description: The unique identifier for the sales tax.

symbol.description: Symbol used to denote that a number is a monetary value.

value.description: Amount represented as a combination of the major and minor currency unit (uses a decimal separator).

lastSentAt.description: When the invoice was last sent.

lastSentVia.description: How the invoice was last sent.

lastViewedAt.description: When the invoice was last viewed by the customer.

modifiedAt.description: When the invoice was last modified.

pdfUrl.description: URL to access PDF representation of the invoice.

poNumber.description: Purchase order or sales order number for the invoice.

priceTitle.description: The label for the 'Price' column in the listing of line items on the invoice.

symbol.description: Symbol used to denote that a number is a monetary value.

value.description: Amount represented as a combination of the major and minor currency unit (uses a decimal separator).

title.description: Invoice title at the top of the document.

symbol.description: Symbol used to denote that a number is a monetary value.

value.description: Amount represented as a combination of the major and minor currency unit (uses a decimal separator).

unitTitle.description: The label for the 'Unit' column in the listing of line items on the invoice.

viewUrl.description: URL to view the invoice online as seen by a customer.
